definition: to change one's costume/to repackage/to remodel/to refit/to modify/to convert
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Jim, and his wife Paige, drive around the world in a modified Mercedes.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆和他的妻子佩奇，推動全世界的改裝奔馳車。

sentences.english: The result of running-in indicates that the refitting project is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 試運轉及裝車路試說明，改裝設計方案是可行的。

sentences.english: Cartrider bicycle created by Korean designer Jaebeom Jeong.
sentences.chinese: 韓國設計師設計的由超市購物車改裝成的自行車。

sentences.english: I can rig it so it detonates on impact.
sentences.chinese: 我可以改裝讓炸彈立即引爆。

sentences.english: USS New Jersey BB-62 after the 1968 modernization.
sentences.chinese: 1968年經過現代化改裝後的新澤西號戰列艦。

sentences.english: And the king of Israel disguised himself， and went into the battle.
We're making our attic into an extra bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在把閣樓改裝成一間額外的臥室。

sentences.english: Modding it is just a complete headache.
sentences.chinese: 這完全是個頭痛的改裝。

sentences.english: How many programmers does it take to change a light-bulb?
sentences.chinese: 需要多少程序猿能改裝這個燈泡？

sentences.english: They rebuilt cars. They loved motorcycles.
sentences.chinese: 他們改裝車，他們喜摩托。

sentences.english: Find also the equivalent resistance of the adapted meter.
sentences.chinese: 求改裝後的安培計的電阻。

sentences.english: Double joint added to the front drive shaft and the shaft made longer.
sentences.chinese: 改裝內容包括雙十字軸和加長前傳動軸。

sentences.english: They also converted into the different types of snow removal vehicles, cars.
sentences.chinese: 他們也把各類車輛改裝成鏟雪車使用。

sentences.english: The most common appearance is modified with aero.
sentences.chinese: 外觀改裝最常見的就是加裝空氣動力套件。

sentences.english: Refit vehicle must be in accordance with the relevant regulations of the premise.
sentences.chinese: 改裝汽車一定要在符合相關法規的前提下進行。

sentences.english: That mountain Bike was refitted to become a moped.
sentences.chinese: 那輛山地車已經被改裝成了一輛助力車。

definition: to replace (a worn-out tire etc)/to change (one's address etc)
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
